other_tests.findings: MH-susceptible diagnosis confirmed in halothane/caffeine muscle test.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Both parents were diagnosed as MH-negative, but the mother was found to be MH-susceptible 2 months later.

other_tests.procedure_name: Histopathologic examination of a muscle biopsy

other_tests.findings: Confirmed familial relationship and mutations present in MH-susceptible individuals.

other_tests.procedure_name: Peripheral nerve block using nerve stimulator technique
other_tests.findings: Elicited movement sensation in phantom extremity; patient felt a decrement in phantom pain.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Sensation returned in her phantom foot approximately 24 hours after block placement.

other_tests.findings: Small thoracic band of anesthesia with no change in heart rate or blood pressure.
